subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Patriots quarterback Tom Brady is confident receiver Randy Moss -- who caught an N.F.L. record 23 touchdowns this season -- will be a big impact on the Super Bowl whether he catches the ball or not.
snippet: Patriots quarterback Tom Brady is confident receiver Randy Moss -- who caught an N.F.L. record 23 touchdowns this season -- will be a big impact on the Super Bowl whether he catches the ball or not.
